sect1.title: Task Resolution
sect1.para: Tasks are resolved by rolling dice, adding the characters Skill or Talent to the die roll, and comparing the result to a TD. If the die roll plus the Skill or Talent is greater or equal than the TD, the Task succeeds. If it is less, the attempt fails.

para.emphasis: Optionally, the GM may use the amount by which the attempt fails or succeeds to determine the degree of success or failure.

sect1.para: Two ten sided dice are rolled for Task Resolution. DNet uses an open-ended die roll method designated d10-d10* (See Reroll Method).
